post.author: Chris
post.content:
You can split the file into smaller files using several different utilities.  I use WinZip 8.1 and it works great.  Our firewall is controlled by me, so I can send any size file (but not the users), but I have to use this utility most of the times because of the same problem at the receipient side.  Eval copy is free and fully functioning, so just download and use it.


>100 MB되는 화일을 다른 PC사용자(다른 회사)에게 보내야 합니다.
>Zip을 해도 10MB정도가 됩니다. fire wall때문에 ftp도 쉽지 않고....
>HTML문서나 어떤 다른 형태의 방법이 있으면 알려주세요.
>web에는 문외한이라서.
post.title: [re] HELP! (Sending big size file)
